website_summaries.verdict: This mousse has earned a reputation for delivering flexible hold and reliable frizz control for all types of curls. The moisturizing effect it provides is a welcome bonus, especially for those with dry hair.
pros: A popular mousse for curly hair that works well on waves, curls, and tight coils
Controls frizz without feeling crunchy when just the right amount of product is applied
Gives curls nice definition and bounce
cons: Some customers found the scent to be too strong and "perfumey."
Can feel a bit sticky if you use too much

customer_reviews.title: Makes Hair Curly and Soft!
customer_reviews.text: My stylist uses this for my curly hair. He likes it better than some of the other products for styling curls because he said it is more "nutritious" for the hair. I was using some other products and decided to try this myself. Some of the other products can make my hair seem kind of stiff or dry but this one does seem to make the hair look healthier and it certainly feels softer.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Bad container design!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first couple of times used. Then started to come out of the cannister too liquidy... not enough mousse to use on hair. Seems like a bad container design, or maybe I received a faulty container.
customer_reviews.author: genade

customer_reviews.title: Does not help to shape/manage curls. My hair is ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not help to shape/manage curls. My hair is wavy and needs mousse to go from waive to curl. I have used many different products cheap -- to more expensive and this product was the least helpful. It turned the curls into a hard frizzy mess and weighed down curls. The Bouffante is much more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Lara W.

customer_reviews.title: Use Sparingly!
customer_reviews.text: I have chin length wavy hair that frizzes quite a lot but I like the waves I have. I used the recommended amount of product, it held the waves with stiffness which I believe was because I used too much for my length. It was extremely hard to wash out the next day, needed to shampoo and condition twice. I've used it again with a quarter of the recommended amount of the product and that amount seems to be right for my length. The stiffness is manageable and my waves are just fine.
customer_reviews.author: C S.

customer_reviews.title: Smells sooo good!
customer_reviews.text: Kerastase is the most amazing hair products; hands down, all around the best!
customer_reviews.author: Kooper01

customer_reviews.title: Gotta watch how much you use. Evaluate the amount ...
customer_reviews.text: Gotta watch how much you use. Evaluate the amount of hair you have and use accordingly. Directions are for a real mop. It works as advertised, no stiff curls.
customer_reviews.author: Gay B. Goff

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for days I want to wear my hair curly. It adds control without weighing it down.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is garbage. It does nothing. I even tried to make a cocktail with my other favorite products to try to use it up. It just made my hair worse.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lovett

customer_reviews.title: Creates great fexture and curl
customer_reviews.text: My hair has a slight wave. Thus priduct gives body and curl
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great mouse for curly hair. love how it makes my hair look and smell
customer_reviews.author: Cheka Handal

customer_reviews.title: Terrible container
customer_reviews.text: The product works very well But The container is terrible. I was able to use this product only once :( and basically lost all my money as I can access the mousse. The lid is not working.Please help
customer_reviews.author: Gi

customer_reviews.title: This Product Is “ Ideal”!
customer_reviews.text: Other mousse products dry out my hair. However, Kerastase Mousse Curl Ideal always leaves my hair soft and manageable with just the right amount of curl!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Isselee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it didn't really work any differently than what I usually buy at a much cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: fletch

customer_reviews.title: Did not like it
customer_reviews.text: Unusually love all Kérastase products, but this mousse is simply to heavy on hair. No movement at all!
customer_reviews.author: CECILIA

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, tames my waves and curls. No frizz even in the middle of summer.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette H.

customer_reviews.title: Product is not second hand, but original manfacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Product came unsealed and sticky on the canister, as if it had been used previously.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Kept trying and it is looking great!
customer_reviews.text: i kept trying this and it ads a beautiful shine and does make big beautiful curls. I just need a creme Under it or have trouble spreading it. It makes my frizz look like real good hair! So, I'm happy I kept working with it. Sometimes it takes that when you change products.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love this product for my curls
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. First got in my salon and then wanted to save a few bucks so ordered it here - and it is exactly the same as what I get in the salon. Light but very defined hold for curls . . .also gives excellent "second day" hair.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Moroccanoil curl defining cream if superior product for my curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: julie t copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: The best mousse for fine curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Amazing control of frizz while maintaining softness. The best product I've found.
customer_reviews.author: catchy

customer_reviews.title: The brand is excellent and it's aroma is awesome
customer_reviews.text: The brand is excellent and it's aroma is awesome. It does not leave white residue in your hair, the only bad thing is your hair starts getting dry so you can't use daily.
customer_reviews.author: Tita R.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty container
customer_reviews.text: Faulty container; the mechanism that turns liquid to foam does not work.
customer_reviews.author: L E Woolcott

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is TERRIBLE! It smells awful and is very sticky, I hated it. Amazon will not allow me to return it, so I am out money and stuck with a horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna H. Baynton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds curls without too much load in your hair !
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: I started using this product and after the 3rd day ...
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product and after the 3rd day of usage, the mechanism to get the mousse out stop working. Now I don't know what to do with this full container from wich I not able to get the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect curls!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of products for curly hair, I have Type 2 curls and this product works perfect for me. It defines my curls without adding weight or making it dull. Result: shiny, bouncy curls with no frizz. I'm 40 and my hair is colored.
customer_reviews.author: James A

product_meta.title: Kerastase Mousse Curl Ideal, 5 Ounce
product_meta.description: Curl natural touch, first-move-compatible care for waves that can not be brought under control. Especially curls care and is formulated for the apparent. Kerasotes discipline mousse curl ideal definition bounce care mousse for curly hair.

Especially curls care and is formulated for the apparent Kerasotes discipline Mousse curl ideal definition bounce care Mousse for curly hair
